content: It’s true that one can learn how to write vivid descriptions and complex characters without having to focus on comics. However, Neil Gaiman’s comic book background has had a significant impact on his writing style, as evidenced by the numerous ways in which his comic book skills are reflected in his novels. While other writers may be able to write similarly detailed descriptions and complex characters, Gaiman’s specific style and approach to his writing is unique and has been shaped by his years of experience in the comic book industry. Additionally, it's important to note that creative individuals often draw inspiration and techniques from a variety of sources, and for Gaiman, comics have played a significant role in shaping his writing style.
